CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, page A12 reads: "Roaring '20s' - This trio, Francis Nunn, Vivian Kizee and Norma Malone, represented the chorus which brought back memories of the 'Roaring 'Twenties' with its Charleston number. In red and white, they were quite a picture. 'Shorts' Davis was the versatile emcee." Headline reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Frances Bell Nunn, Vivian Kizee, and Norma Malone wearing flapper costumes, posed in Horizon room for Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Dance costume--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Nunn, Frances Bell.Kizee, Vivian.Malone, Norma.
